content.rendered: Brian Zanotelli is one of Malheur County, Oregon’s most skilled courtroom lawyers. He represents individuals, families, and businesses in civil litigation and criminal defense matters. Whether you need help starting a lawsuit or defending a lawsuit, the first step in choosing a lawyer is to discuss your particular situation, face to face, through an initial consultation.
